data.message: I went through most of ur comments guys and most of u are standing against em I can't believe it. If u were really fans u would never do that.

replies.message: Plus it's not like he's gonna read ur comments and make him change his mind. He doesn't give a s*** about what ur thinking. And he did so because he thinks it's the right thing to do "support the minority, those that whose needs aren't heard"
Well when he’s say fuck you to his fans that don’t think the same way he does about our president. Doesn’t really make me want to support him any more !
